name: Retro Fairground
description:
edit : if the game crashes on the control screen, download it from this link.

Retro Fairground.

Wanna play Pong? Or a soccer game? Or a revisited Pachinko? Or a two player Breakout game? Or a retrofuturistic pool game?
Well... YOU CAN PLAY ALL THESE GAMES AT THE SAME TIME THANKS TO: RETRO FAIRGROUND!

There isn't just one entire game on one screen.
There are five entire games on one screen!

IT'S PURE MADNESS!

| CONTROLS |

Magenta: W, A, S, D
Cyan: Up, Left, Down, Right

Retro mode: P
Credits: C
Restart game: R

Have fun!

We hope you enjoy Retro Fairground.
The Glowing Alligator team.
